phrs.translation: 优秀自动化制造规范, 生产自动化管理规范, 良好自动化生产规范, 优良自动化生产规范(Good Automated Manufacturing Practice)
自动化生产质量管理规范

sentences.sentence: Results Both GAMP derivatives and GAMP-protein conjugates showed GAMP antigen specificity.
sentences.translation: 结果多糖衍生物、多糖-蛋白质结合物均具有GAMP抗原特异性；

sentences.sentence: The complement-dependent bactericidal experiment showed that serum GAMP antibodies induced by the conjugate had stronger bactericidal activity.
sentences.translation: 结合物免疫小鼠所诱生的血清GAMP抗体较之多糖组具有更强的体外杀菌活性。

sentences.sentence: In the last couple of years, he has been lecturing about GAMP and the new paradigm of pharmaceutical manufacturing with use of Quality by Design worldwide.
sentences.translation: 近几年来，他一直结合运用“质量源于设计”的理念，各处讲演gamp和医药加工的范例。
